divs: sighting detailsat approximately 6:20 pm mst my brother bill called me outside with what i thought sounded to be quite excited. i rushed outside as quickly as possible and he said, "look right there!", as he pointed to be south, south east. i would say it looked to be over the denver\aurora skyline. it looked to be falling straight down, then all of a sudden it split or broke up into four fire balls, all of which were still extremely bright and seemed to be about the same size as original. then it looked to me as if they started kind of swirling and coming together again while slowing down to almost a complete stop just above a tree line in my view. we rushed inside to grab chairs but when i returned the fireballs were gone.
trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
There were 2 other sightings in Denver on or around November 9th 2009
Summary: Saw bright Orange/Yellow fireball falling then break up and collect again
